        <name>Mivtachim The Workers Social Insurance Fund Ltd. (Under Special Management)</name>

      <reportType>13F HOLDINGS REPORT</reportType>
      <form13FFileNumber>028-15914</form13FFileNumber>
      <provideInfoForInstruction5>Y</provideInfoForInstruction5>
      <additionalInformation>The securities reported herein are beneficially owned by the Israel senior pension and provident funds under a special manager appointed by law by the Supervisor of Capital Markets, Insurance &amp; Savings of the State of Israel (the "Funds"). "Amitim Senior Pension Funds" is the "brand name" of the organizational structure that incorporates the Funds. "Amitim Senior Pension Funds" is not a legal entity, while each of the Funds is a separate legal entity.  For convenience only, this form is filed by "Mivtachim The Workers Social Insurance Fund Ltd. (Under Special Management)" ("Mivtachim"), which is one the Funds.  It should be noted that the Information Table contained herein includes holdings of two Funds that are otherwise required to file Form 13F ((i) Kerren Makefet Pension and Provident Center - Cooperative Society Ltd. (Under Special Management) and (ii) Kerren Hgimlaot Hmerkazit Histradrut Central Pension Fund Ltd. - Under Special Management), as well as holdings of Mivtachim listed together with (i) the holdings of other Funds and (ii) portion of the investment portfolio of Karnit Road Accident Victims Compensation Fund (which is currently managed by Mivtachim), which are not individually required to file Form 13F.</additionalInformation>
    </coverPage>
    <signatureBlock>
      <name>Eli Levi</name>
      <title>Chief Financial Officer</title>
